00024 BOOL SwarmActivityDialog::OnInitDialog() {
00025         if (!CPropertyPage::OnInitDialog())
00026                 return false;
00027         for (int i=0; i< N_EVENT_TYPES;i++) {
00028                 // add dialog to a tab
00029                  m_eventDetector[i]->Create(m_eventDetector[i]->IDD, this);
00030                  m_eventParameters.AddSSLPage(_T(m_eventDetector[i]->name), i, m_eventDetector[i]);
00031         }
00032         return true;
00033 }
00034 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 bool SwarmActivityDialog::Initialize() {
00036         if (!SwarmActivityModel::Initialize())
00037                 return false;
00038         m_eventCheckIDC[0] = IDC_PROXIMITY;     
00039         m_eventCheckIDC[1] = IDC_GROUPING;
00040         m_eventCheckIDC[2] = IDC_LEADERFOLLOWING;
00041         m_eventCheckIDC[3] = IDC_LININGUP;
00042         m_eventCheckIDC[4] = IDC_CODWELLING;
00043         m_initialized = true;
00044         // TEMP:
00045         m_eventType[1] = 1;
00046         return true;
00047 }
00048 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void SwarmActivityDialog::DeInitialize() {
00050         SwarmActivityModel::DeInitialize();
00051         for (int i=0; i< N_EVENT_TYPES;i++) {
00052                 m_eventType[i] = 0;
00053         }
00054 }
00055 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void SwarmActivityDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00057 {
00058         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00059         for (int i=0; i< N_EVENT_TYPES;i++) {
00060                 DDX_Check(pDX, m_eventCheckIDC[i], m_eventType[i]);
00061         }
00062         
00063         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_SWARMACTIVITYTAB, m_eventParameters);
00064 
00065         int n = m_eventParameters.GetSSLActivePage();
00066         if (n >= 0)
00067                 m_eventDetector[n]->UpdateData(pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate);
00068 }
00069 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void SwarmActivityDialog::Serialize( CArchive& ar ) {
00071         CObject::Serialize(ar);
00072         for (int i=0; i< N_EVENT_TYPES;i++) {
00073                 m_eventDetector[i]->Serialize(ar);
00074                 ar.IsStoring() ? ar << m_eventType[i] : ar >> m_eventType[i];
00075         }
00076 }
00077 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void SwarmActivityDialog::OnBnClickedButtonDetectNow()
00079 {
00080         ShowProgressDialog("Detecting activities");
00081         int acount = 0;
00082         for (int i=0;i<N_EVENT_TYPES;i++)
00083                 if (m_eventType[i]) {
00084                         acount += m_eventDetector[i]->PostProcessActivities(doc);
00085                 }
00086         HideProgressDialog();
00087 }
